Text.Text: In contrast to jam, these grow on trees.
Fortunately, the artisan's old recipe book reveals a well-kept secret: Grandma's recipe for the extra-fruity cherry jam in stylish and reusable glasses.

This fruity jam is made by hand from ripe sweet and sour cherries with a little bit of sugar. The Jam is stired and tasted until the perfect mixture of cherries and sugar is found. The jam is served grandma's style in chic reusable glasses.
Thick, fruity cherries, picked straight from the tree, not grown inside the glass.
Makes the most delicious jam in recycled glasses.
